column1: You just Can’t Get Enough Of these guys, can you?
Suppose you have to play these maps...
column2: 我看你必须玩下这些地图……
周末工坊兄贵赛获胜图

column1: THE PINNACLE OF TERRORIST GYMING TECHNOLOGY
column2: 最顶级的恐怖健身技术

column1: THE PINNACLE OF UNDEAD GYMING TECHNOLOGY
column2: 最顶级的不死健身技术

column1: THE WEAK SPOT DEEP IN THE INFESTED CAVES
column2: 位于虫灾洞穴深处的弱点

column1:
Broforce, before you go, I want to
introduce you to someone...
column2: 兄贵军团，在你走之前，我想介绍个人给你认识……

column1: Hello, friend. I must ask one last thing of you.
column2: 你好啊，朋友。我要问你最后一件事。

column1:
The Earth is now free of terrorism, 
and finally at peace.
column2: 恐怖主义的威胁已消失，地球终于迎来了和平。

column1:
An American fast food restaurant is on every
street corner, and American is spoken everywhere --
column2: 美式快餐馆开满了大街小巷，全世界都在学美国话——
——英国佬的话也越来越美国化。

column1: There is nothing left to do here for a soldier.
column2: 这里已经没有战士的事了。

column1: Come with me, and live in peace...
column2: 跟我来吧，安心地生活在……

column1: Ah, Broforce. You have done the impossible.
column2: 啊，兄贵军团。你们完成了不可能的任务。

column1:
You have brought liberty, and justice,
and peace to the world.
column2: 你们把自由、正义以及和平带给了世界。

column1:
After all you have done, I have but one 
more request. High five me, Bro!
column2: 我还有个不情之请，就是跟我来次击掌，兄贵！

column1:
World leaders have voted unanimously
to elect you grand emperor of the world!
column2: 各国首脑都一致同意推举你们为世界之王！

column1: Gentlemen, a ceremony held in your honor awaits!
column2: 绅士们，为你们举办的庆典正等着呢！

column1:
How did you know that was a lizardman imposter!?
Thanks all the same!
column2:
你怎么知道那是蜥蜴骗子！？
总之谢谢你了！
将恐怖主义带向新高度

column1: THE CULMINATION OF BOTH TERROR AND ALIEN THREATS
column2: 恐怖主义和外星威胁的顶点

column1: You Were Kicked From The Game

A network error occurred.
You got disconnected.
column2:
网络出现错误。
你断开了连接。

column2: 在你被邀请加入游戏的时候网络失去了连接。

column1: The system was unable to find a valid user bound to your controller.
column2: 由于你控制器的原因，系统无法找到有效玩家。

column2: 你的网名是否含有非英文字母？这会让服务器出问题。

column1: You must update the application to use network features.
column2: 你必须升级应用才能使用网络功能。

column2: The session you tried to join is full.

column2: There was a problem with the"PlayStation 4" system session that you were invited to.

column2: 版本不匹配。该玩家用的是新的游戏版本。

column2: 版本不匹配。该玩家用的是老的游戏版本。

PLAYERS CAN ALSO DROP IN DURING THE GAME
column2: 玩家也能在游戏中途加入

column2: 按下 [ENTER] 或手柄上的 [BACK] 来聊天

column2: 游戏人数已满。你现在正在旁观。

column2: Online service is disabled on your Sony Entertainment Network account due to parental control settings.

column2: 由于家长控制设置，你无法加入游戏会话。

column2: You need to have "PlayStation Plus" to use this online feature.

column2: Please connect to "PlayStation Network" to access this feature

column2: You have been signed out of "PlayStation Network". Online features will not be available until you sign in.

JUMP (CAN USE SAME KEY AS UP): {0}

column2: 继 续 游 戏

column1: PLAY THROUGH ALL THE LEVELS WITHOUT BEING BURDENED BY OUR OVERBEARING NARRATIVE!
column2: 直到通关都可以不用忍受我们傲慢的解说员！

column1: HARD IS BRUTAL! WE RECOMMEND YOU TRY PLAYING ON NORMAL FIRST!
column2: 困难即是残酷！我们推荐你优先尝试普通难度！

column1:
IRONBRO ON HARD IS NOT EVEN REMOTELY FAIR AND WAS NOT DESIGNED TO BE BEATABLE.
PLAY AT YOUR OWN RISK!
column2:
硬汉加困难就是赖皮难度，它不是以能通关为标准来设计的。
非要玩的话后果自负！

column1: EACH BRO CAN ONLY DIE ONCE! LOSE ALL BROS AND YOU LOSE! SINGLE PLAYER ONLY
column2: 每位兄贵只能死一次！全死了你就输了！仅限单人模式

column1: You need to unlock more bros to unlock IRONBRO Mode!
column2: 你需要解锁更多兄贵来开启硬汉模式！

column1: UNLOCK ONE MORE BRO TO UNLOCK IRONBRO MODE!
column2: 还需要解锁多一名兄贵来开启硬汉模式！

column1: CAUTION, AREAS HAVE BEEN LIBERATED THAT YOU HAVE YET TO VISIT
column2: 注意，你还没去过的区域已经被解放了

column2: 游戏进度将会丢失。你确定吗？
玩家 {0} 获得此轮胜利！
平局！为兄贵赛做好准备！
救 援 后 可 以
救 援 后 可 以

column1: SELECT FROM DEATHMATCH AND RACE CAMPAIGNS YOU HAVE SAVED LOCALLY
column2: 从本地选择用于死斗和竞速模式的战役

column1: This is the Amazone. Extraterrestrial extremists have been sighted in the deep forests! Terrestrialize them!
column2: 这里是亚马戎。据目击情报称在森林深处有外星极端分子出没！让他们化作地球的尘土吧！

column1: This is a <COLOR=#990000>Covert Operation</COLOR>. A lone bro must <COLOR=#ff6c00>recapture</COLOR> the supply drops that have fallen into terrorist hands.
column2: 这是项<COLOR=#990000>秘密行动</COLOR>。一名孤胆兄贵必须<COLOR=#ff6c00>夺回</COLOR>落入恐怖分子之手的空投补给。

column1: This is a <COLOR=#990000>Covert Operation</COLOR>. A lone bro must <COLOR=#ff6c00>survive</COLOR> the terrorist bombardment and <COLOR=#ff6c00>assassinate</COLOR> their leader.
column2: 这是项<COLOR=#990000>秘密行动</COLOR>。一名孤胆兄贵必须在恐怖分子的轰炸中<COLOR=#ff6c00>存活</COLOR>下来并<COLOR=#ff6c00>暗杀</COLOR>掉他们的首领。

column1: This is Cambodium - soon to be CamBROdium. Get to work!
column2: 这里是简谱寨——很快就会变为兄贵寨。开工了！

column1: The mysterious land of Afreeka has reported sightings of extra-terrestrial illegal aliens. Freedominate them!
column2: 据目击情报称在神秘的绯洲大陆上有外星人非法逗留。超度他们！

column1: This is a <COLOR=#990000>Covert Operation</COLOR>. A lone bro must use agility to <COLOR=#ff6c00>penetrate</COLOR> the terrorist defences and <COLOR=#ff6c00>assassinate</COLOR> their leader.
column2: 这是项<COLOR=#990000>秘密行动</COLOR>。一名孤胆兄贵必须凭借自己灵活的身手<COLOR=#ff6c00>潜入</COLOR>恐怖分子的防御设施并<COLOR=#ff6c00>暗杀</COLOR>掉他们的首领。

column1: This is a <COLOR=#990000>Covert Operation</COLOR>. Ellen Ripbro is deep in alien territory, on a mission to <COLOR=#ff6c00>purge</COLOR> the alien hive.
column2: 这是项<COLOR=#990000>秘密行动</COLOR>。艾伦·雷普贵正深入外星人腹地，执行一项<COLOR=#ff6c00>肃清</COLOR>外星蜂巢的任务。

column1: This is Hawaii. Aliens have invaded here on American borders! De-alienate them!
column2: 这里是夏威夷。外星人已经从美国的边境入侵到这里了！ 剿灭他们吧！

column1: This is The United States of America. Strange reports of demons and massive evil have flooded in. Humanize them!
column2: 这里是美利坚合众国。据奇怪的报告称恶魔以及大量邪物已经涌入。教他们做人！

column1: The people from this country look, speak and act differently to us. Let's move fast, Bros!
column2: 这里的人长相、谈吐和行为都和我们不一样。快出发吧，兄贵！

column1: No time to explain! You know what to do, Broforce!
column2: 没时间解释了！你知道该怎么做的，兄贵军团！

column1: This is Arstotzka. Sources claim that it is, in fact, a country. Let's move out!
column2: 这里是阿什托兹卡。有情报称它是实际存在的国家。我们出发吧！

column1: This is <color=#900>Irakistan</color> - and they said we wouldn't be able to find it on a map!
column2: 这里是<color=#900>伊拉克斯坦</color>——他们说我们无法从地图上找到他们！

column1: This is a <COLOR=#990000>Covert Operation</COLOR>. MacBrover is deep in enemy territory, on a mission to <COLOR=#ff6c00>actually murder</COLOR> the terrorist leader.
column2: 这是项<COLOR=#990000>秘密行动</COLOR>。马贵先正深入敌方腹地，执行一项<COLOR=#ff6c00>确实杀死</COLOR>恐怖分子首领的任务。

column1: This is a <COLOR=#990000>Covert Operation</COLOR>. A lone bro must <COLOR=#ff6c00>appropriate</COLOR> the terrorist's own weaponry and <COLOR=#ff6c00>assassinate</COLOR> their leader.
column2: 这是项<COLOR=#990000>秘密行动</COLOR>。一名孤胆兄贵必须<COLOR=#ff6c00>盗取</COLOR>恐怖分子的专属武器并<COLOR=#ff6c00>暗杀</COLOR>掉他们的首领。

column1: Something something bipartisan something something unilateral military intervention. Let's go!
column2: 就是两党合作、单边军事介入等这样那样的事。我们走吧！

column1: This is Val Verde. Time to stabilize the region with our overwhelming firepower! GO GO GO!
column2: 这里是巴尔韦德。是时候动用我们强大的火力来稳定这一区域了！冲冲冲！

column1: Unconfirmed reports of WMD's in Jalpin have necessitated a pre-emptive strike. Keep on your toes, Broforce!
column2: 据未确认报告称黑律宾藏有大规模杀伤性武器，我们有必要先发制人。保持警惕，兄贵军团！

column1: This country really, really hates liberty. Probably. Show them why they are wrong!
column2: 这国家或许是真的真的很讨厌自由。让他们知道自己是错的！

column1: This is a <COLOR=#990000>Covert Operation</COLOR>. Time Bro is deep in enemy territory, on a mission to <COLOR=#ff6c00>assassinate</COLOR> the terrorist leader.
column2: 这是项<COLOR=#990000>秘密行动</COLOR>。时空贵警正深入敌方腹地，执行一项 <COLOR=#ff6c00>暗杀</COLOR>恐怖分子首领的任务。

column1: Youkraine? More like our kraine! Claim it for freeeeeedom!
column2: 汝克兰？现在要改名叫吾克兰了！ 为自自自自自自由占领它！

column1: POWs have been stranded in Veetman for 25 years now. Find them and save them!
column2: 我们的战俘已经被囚在月南25年了。找到并解救他们！

column1: This is the White House, 'Murica! Time to party on taxpayer dollars!
column2: 这里是白宫，美国佬！是时候用税钱来开派对了！
